weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy, what am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm cold!
🐇 You can make a snowman with me.
🌨️ I come in the winter.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I come out during the day.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I can make you feel warm.

weather.question: I come from clouds, and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants like me.
💦 Puddles form because of me.

weather.question: I'm a big storm with lots of wind and rain. I spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ Some are named after people.
🌊 I can cause big waves near the ocean.
🌀 I have an 'eye' in the middle.

weather.question: I'm white and float in the sky, sometimes blocking the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy animals.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌧️ I can bring rain or snow.

weather.question: I am cold and hard, and fall from the sky like rain, but I'm frozen. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you!
🥶 I'm made of ice.
☄️ I'm bigger than snowflakes.

weather.question: I am a strong, rotating column of air that touches the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I'm shaped like a funnel.
🐄 You don't want to be in my way.
💨 I can lift things up into the sky.

weather.question: I am a bright light in the sky, often followed by a loud crash. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come during a thunderstorm.
🌩️ I'm a form of electricity.
💥 I can be dangerous.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky that appears after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🍀 Some people think there's a pot of gold at my end.
💧 I appear when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I'm a mixture of snow and rain. I'm icy and can make roads slippery. What am I?

hints.text: 🌨️ I'm not quite rain, and not quite snow.
🥶 I'm cold and wet.
🚗 Be careful driving when I am around.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make something sweet.
🐝 I live in a hive.
🌼 I collect pollen.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and I'm considered good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I'm small and round.
🍎 I'm the color of an apple.
🌱 Gardeners like me because I eat aphids.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I am green and have strong legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy fields.
🎵 I make a chirping sound.
🐸 I am not a frog, but I jump like one!

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and work together in a big group. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I carry food much bigger than myself.
👑 I have a queen.
🕳️ We live in a colony underground.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and end up with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves when I'm young.
🌈 I come in many colors.
🦋 I fly from flower to flower.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. Some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I'm not an insect.
🏠 Some people think I make my home look spooky at Halloween.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 My light is a cool light.
🌃 I'm most active when it's dark.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I look like a stick and blend into the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am a master of disguise.
🍃 My body helps me hide from predators.
🐛 I only eat plants

bug.question: I live in water and can sting you, but I'm not a bee. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can be found in ponds and lakes.
🏊 I'm an insect that is an excellent swimmer.
🦂 I have a painful sting.

bug.question: I'm a master of camouflage and strike very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 My front legs look like I'm praying.
🦗 I eat other insects.
🌿 I blend in with green leaves.
